description: The mayor of Paris took a dip in the River Seine to reassure athletes and others that the river is clean enough to swim in during the Paris Olympics. NBC News' Rehema Ellis reports.
title: Paris mayor takes a swim in River Seine ahead of Olympics

description: In a shocking discovery, six bodies were discovered in a room at a luxury hotel in Bangkok, Thailand. Investigators said all six were of Vietnamese descent, and two of them were U.S. citizens. They say traces of cyanide were found in different areas of the hotel suite. NBC News' Janis Mackey Frayer reports.
title: Two Americans among six possibly poisoned by cyanide in Thai hotel

description: NBC News filmed the chaos after another UNRWA school was hit by an Israeli airstrike in Gaza. Dozens of civilians were killed and wounded while sheltering at the Al-Razi facility in Nuseirat.
title: ‘Destruction and body parts’: Displaced Gazans killed in Israeli attack on U.N. school

description: King Charles III delivered a speech in the House of Lords outlining the new U.K. government’s legislative agenda during the State Opening of Parliament. The speech, written by the newly elected Labour Party, included laws that Prime Minister Keir Starmer will prioritize after his party’s landslide win.
title: King Charles opens U.K. parliament after landslide election

description: Rapper Drake shared a video of murky water flooding his Toronto mansion as heavy rains inundated parts of Canada on Tuesday and knocked out power for thousands of customers.
title: Drake's Toronto mansion floods as intense rainfall in Canada knocks out power for thousands

description: Dozens of members of an uncontacted Indigenous tribe have been photographed on a riverbank in the remote Peruvian Amazon, near to an area where logging companies have been granted concessions by the country's government.
title: Rare video shows uncontacted Indigenous tribe members in Peru

description: Peruvian authorities reported that at least 20 people were killed when a bus skidded off a mountain road in Southern Peru. The bus of the Molina Union company departed from the capital Lima. In 2023 there were some 3,138 deaths resulting from traffic accidents, according to a police report.
title: Bus accident in Southern Peru kills at least 20 people

description: Forensics experts in Thailand said that the six people who were found dead in a Bangkok hotel room were poisoned, with cyanide the most likely substance used.
title: Six people, including two Vietnamese Americans, were most likely poisoned, Thailand police say

description: An intense storm resulted in significant flooding across Toronto, with water inundating the mansion of rapper and singer Drake. In downtown Toronto, roads were flooded and stairs were turned into waterfalls.
title: Rapper Drake's Toronto home flooded after severe thunderstorms strike city
